content.description:
Climb started from big ledge left from "Hand Out".

First few hard moves to reach the horizontal rail . Than  climbing difficult crack  behind the flake ( size from purple to green to red camalots).

When crack diminishing - traverse right and merge with "Hand Out".

The route share anchors with  "Hand Out".
content.protection:
from micro nuts to #1

I placed protection bolt in the bottom of the climb assuming I was doing first accent .

Later I found that this route was climbed 30 years ago without this bolt.

So if you come to climb the route you can remove this bolt.

content.description:
Start  hand-jams around the flake than feet traverse to the obvious leaning left-leaning tight hands/finger crack.

When crack diminishing - some holds appears which lead you to the bolted anchor with tricky mantel move.

You clip quickdraw to the anchor and do the hardest move.
content.protection:
Single from green alien to #4.

double from 0.5 to #1 Camalot
